taskbody.context: The following steps describe the installation procedure of , valid for Mac OS X:

step.cmd:
Download the Mac OS X Installation package ( oxygen.zip
oxygenAuthor.zip
oxygenDeveloper.zip
oxygenXMLDiff.zip
syncroSVNClient.zip ).
step.info: The compressed file should be recognized and expanded by the web browser (Safari). If it is not automatically expanded, you can expand it manually by double clicking it.

step.cmd: In Finder, move the expanded folder to your Applications folder.

To run , double click Oxygen.app
OxygenAuthor.app
OxygenDeveloper.app
OxygenXMLDiff.app
SyncroSVNClient.app

note.p: uses the first JVM from the list of preferred JVM versions, set on your Mac computer, that has the version number or newer. To change the version of the Java Virtual Machine that runs the , go to Applications -> Utilities -> Java -> Java Preferences and drag the new JVM version up in the list of preferred versions.

step.cmd: Copy to clipboard the license key you have received by email and paste it in the license registration dialog.

note.p: To avoid an unpredictable behavior of the cursor, use a fixed-size font, for example Monaco. You can find more details about this behaviour here.
